Class Satellite

java.lang.Object
  Satellite

public class Satellite
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a satellite in orbit around the Earth's equator.

Constructor Detail

Satellite

public Satellite(double x,
                 double y,
                 double vx,
                 double vy)
Constructs a Satellite at the desired location with desired speed

Parameters:
x - The starting x position in meters of a satellite in a coordinate system with the origin at the center of the Earth
y - The starting y position in meters of a satellite in a coordinate system with the origin at the center of the Earth
vx - current velocity of the the satellite in the x direction measured in meters per second
vy - current velocity of the the satellite in the y direction measured in meters per second
